parameters.name: serverAddress
parameters.helpmessage: IP or FQDN of the remote Windows machine

parameters.name: serverUser
parameters.helpmessage: User name to connect to the remote Windows machine, in form of 'domain\username'

parameters.name: property
parameters.helpmessage:
Property name or 'name=value' pairs. Each definition per line. 
			If value contains multiple items, separate them by comma.

description:
Run commands on SSH servers.
Copy files to SFTP servers.

parameters.name: serverAddress
parameters.helpmessage: IP or FQDN of SSH or SFTP server. Support multiple values seperated by comma.

parameters.name: serverUser
parameters.helpmessage: User name to connect to the server (default is root)

parameters.name: fileUrl
parameters.helpmessage: Files to copy from local server or online. Each file per line.

parameters.name: file
parameters.helpmessage: File to upload from client machine

parameters.name: outputCheck
parameters.helpmessage: Method to check if specific string could (or could not) be found in output. Default is 'like'.

parameters.name: serverAddress
parameters.helpmessage: IP or FQDN of broker server

parameters.name: getDesktopState
parameters.helpmessage: This command get states of desktops in pools

parameters.name: vcUser
parameters.helpmessage: User name to connect to VC server (default is administrator)

parameters.name: composerUser
parameters.helpmessage:
User name to connect to composer server (default is 
      local\administrator)

parameters.name: domainUser
parameters.helpmessage: User of composer domain (default is administrator)

parameters.name: useComposer
parameters.helpmessage: Whether to use compopser if installed on VC

parameters.name: parentVmPath
parameters.helpmessage:
Path to a virtual machine to be used as the parent VM 
      for this desktop pool.

parameters.name: parentSnapshotPath
parameters.helpmessage:
Path to the snapshot that is to be used as the image 
      for this pool, i.e. /clean or /clean/test0

parameters.name: vmFolderPath
parameters.helpmessage:
Specify a location for this new directory as a vCenter 
      folder path.

parameters.name: resourcePoolPath
parameters.helpmessage: Path to a resource pool to be used for this desktop pool.

parameters.name: datastoreSpecs
parameters.helpmessage:
List of datastore specs for storage of desktop VMs and 
      data disks, separated by semicolons using the format: 
      '[Overcommit,usage]/path/to/datastore'

parameters.name: min
parameters.helpmessage: Minimum number of desktops to be provisioned in this pool.

parameters.name: max
parameters.helpmessage: Maximum number of desktops to be provisioned in this pool.

parameters.name: agentVmName
parameters.helpmessage:
Agent virtual machine name in the vCenter inventory. 
      Support multiple values seperated by comma.

parameters.name: tsVmName
parameters.helpmessage: Transfer server virtual machine name in the vCenter inventory

parameters.name: rmFromDisk
parameters.helpmessage: Whether to remove VM from disk. Default is false

parameters.name: logoffPool
parameters.helpmessage: Send session logoff message to all desktops in a pool

parameters.name: filePath
parameters.helpmessage: Path to the broker settings file, default is c:\temp\broker.ldif

parameters.name: enable
parameters.helpmessage: Select true to enable or false to disable

parameters.name: setDirectConnect
parameters.helpmessage: Connect to desktop directly or via security tunnel

parameters.name: dbType
parameters.helpmessage: Database server type, default is SQLSERVER

parameters.name: dbUser
parameters.helpmessage: Database user name, default is administrator

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.helpmessage:
Pairing password timeout in term of seconds, 
      default is 86400

description: This command installs View components on remote Windows machine.

parameters.name: winAddress
parameters.helpmessage: IP / FQDN of target Windows machine

parameters.name: winUser
parameters.helpmessage: User of target Windows machine (default is administrator)

parameters.name: type
parameters.helpmessage: Type of the View component to install

parameters.name: serverAddress
parameters.helpmessage: IP or FQDN of the ESX or VC server hosting the VM

parameters.name: serverUser
parameters.helpmessage: User name to connect to the server (default is root)

parameters.name: vmName
parameters.helpmessage: Name of target VM. Support multiple values seperated by comma.

parameters.name: guestUser
parameters.helpmessage: User of target machine (default is administrator)

parameters.name: serverAddress
parameters.helpmessage: IP or FQDN of the ESX or VC server hosting the VM

parameters.name: serverUser
parameters.helpmessage: User name to connect to the server (default is root)

parameters.name: vmName
parameters.helpmessage: Name of target VM. Support multiple values seperated by comma and also wildcard.

parameters.name: answer
parameters.helpmessage: The answer for the question. Default is 'cancel'.

parameters.name: diskNumber
parameters.helpmessage: Number of disks to add. Default is 1.

parameters.name: setPortGroup
parameters.helpmessage: Add VM network card into specified port group

parameters.name: guestUser
parameters.helpmessage: User of target VM (default is administrator)

parameters.name: listSnapshot
parameters.helpmessage: List all snapshots of the VM

parameters.name: serverAddress
parameters.helpmessage: IP or FQDN of ESX or VC server. Support multiple values seperated by comma.

parameters.name: serverUser
parameters.helpmessage: User name to connect to the server (default is root)

parameters.name: listPortGroup
parameters.helpmessage: This method lists port groups on VC or ESX

parameters.name: listDatastore
parameters.helpmessage: This method lists data stores on VC or ESX

parameters.name: listResourcePool
parameters.helpmessage: This method lists data stores on VC or ESX

parameters.name: listVirtualMachine
parameters.helpmessage: This method lists virtual machines on VC or ESX

parameters.name: listVmHost
parameters.helpmessage: This method lists VM hosts on VC or ESX

parameters.name: ntpServerAddress
parameters.helpmessage: IP or FQDN of the NTP server

parameters.name: includeVm
parameters.helpmessage: Whether or not to sync time on VM

parameters.name: syncTime
parameters.helpmessage: This method synchronizes ESXi time to NTP and VM time to host

parameters.name: datastoreList
parameters.helpmessage: NFS stores to mount in form of 'datastore name : NFS host : path'. Support multiple values. Each entry per line.

parameters.name: mountNfsDatastore
parameters.helpmessage: This method mounts NFS shared storage onto ESX

parameters.name: nfsDatastoreName
parameters.helpmessage: Name of NFS datastore to remove

parameters.name: removeNfsDatastore
parameters.helpmessage: This method removes NFS shared storage from ESX

parameters.name: setInterVmPageSharing
parameters.helpmessage: This method sets inter-VM transparent page sharing on ESX or vCenter server.

description:
This command consists of multiple methods for 
  manipulating remote Windows machines.

parameters.name: winAddress
parameters.helpmessage: IP / FQDN of target Windows machine. Support multiple values separated by comma.

parameters.name: winUser
parameters.helpmessage: User of target Windows machine (default is administrator)

parameters.name: newHostName
parameters.helpmessage: New host name. Support multiple values separated by comma.

parameters.name: enableRdp
parameters.helpmessage: Enable RDP access to the Windows machine

parameters.name: uploadFile
parameters.helpmessage: Upload file to remote Windows machine

parameters.name: numberOfLine
parameters.helpmessage:
Number of lines to read. Count from top if positive; 
      Count from bottom if negative. Read all if not defined.

parameters.name: readFile
parameters.helpmessage: Get file content from remote Windows machine

parameters.name: checkWindowsUpdate
parameters.helpmessage: Search availabe Windows Updates on internet

parameters.name: updateServer
parameters.helpmessage: Windows update server from which to download updates, default is 'Internal'

parameters.name: severity
parameters.helpmessage: Severity of the update to install, default is 'Critical'

parameters.name: scriptType
parameters.helpmessage:
Script type.
			Bat: asynchronous, command returns immediately after triggering the script
			Powershell: synchronous, command returns on script completion
			Interactive: synchronous, guestUser must have already logged on
			InteractivePs1: synchronous, guestUser must have already logged on

parameters.name: action
parameters.helpmessage: If enable, winUser automatically logon after Windows starts

description:
This command runs a workflow as a command.
This command could also be embedded in a workflow.

parameters.name: type
parameters.helpmessage: Type of the workflow. Default is 'serial'

parameters.name: workflow
parameters.helpmessage: Workflow in form of JSON. If content is too long, save it in a file and use workflowUrl or file to load it.

parameters.name: workflowOnServer
parameters.helpmessage: Workflow files on webcommander server or online. Each file per line.
